data.title: Passions Tribute
data.text:
"Passions" Final Overall Episode Rankings: 1999-2008. Here's a list of how many episodes each actor has appeared in on "Passions" from 7/5/99-8/7/08, out of a total of 2,233 episodes. Included is anyone appearing in at least 5 episodes. An * denotes a tie in the rankings.
